reviews.title: Ideal for a visit to Berg Eltz & Iffel Mountains
reviews.text: 10 miles down the Mosel river from Cochem is the small town of Moselkern. The Anker-Pitt Hotel is a blast from the past. The decor is perfect 60's. Once you have come to terms with this, especially the exterior, the hotel offer an ideal place to stay for the 30 min (from the car park)wooded walk by a steam to the famous Berg Eltz.
